text: Ani kaphira (inkari loka) mhanale, amhi tara ya kura'anasa mananare nahita, na yacya purvicya granthanna ani jara tumhi pahile asate, jevha he atyacari apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe, ekamekanvara dosaropa thevata asatila. Khalacya darjace loka, ucca darjacya lokanna mhanatila, jara tumhi rahile nasate tara (khatrine) amhi imana rakhanare asato
